amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase Brownfields Redevelopment funding by $1 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect appropriations for the Brownfields Redevelopment by $1 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shays amendment (A011) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Shays.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Shays amendment (A011) Failed by voice vote.
